title: Google To Invest $15 Billion In AI Hub In India, Sundar Pichai Briefs PM Modi
description: Google has said it would invest $15 billion in India over the next five years as it announced a giant data centre and artificial intelligence base in Visakhapatnam.
content:
New Delhi:
Google boss Sundar Pichai on Tuesday said he spoke to Prime Minister Narendra Modi and shared the US tech giant's plans for its artificial intelligence hub in Andhra Pradesh's Visakhapatnam, its biggest ever investment in the country.

title: Google announces $15 billion investment in AI data hub in Andhra Pradesh
description: Google will invest $15 billion over the next five years to set up data centre capacity for an artificial intelligence hub in India's Andhra Pradesh, the company said on Tuesday, marking one of its biggest ever investments in the country.
content: Google in AP: Google will invest $15 billion over the next five years to set up data centre capacity for an artificial intelligence hub in India's Andhra Pradesh, the company said on Tuesday, marking one of its biggest ever investments in the country... [1436 chars]

title: Citi rolls out generative AI in Malaysia to boost productivity and innovation
description: KUALA LUMPUR: Citi has expanded the rollout of its generative artificial intelligence (AI) tools to employees in Malaysia, aiming to boost productivity, foster innovation, and strengthen its leadership in digital banking.
content:

title: AI’s growth leaves financial regulators struggling to catch up
description: Regulators are still at an "early stage" in their efforts to track the risks posed to the financial system by the rapid adoption of artificial intelligence, global financial watchdogs warned on Friday.
content:
Regulators are still at an "early stage” in their efforts to track the risks posed to the financial system by the rapid adoption of artificial intelligence, global financial watchdogs warned on Friday (Oct 10).

title: CEATEC digital tech show kicks off near Tokyo
description: Companies featuring products and services that utilize artificial intelligence account for more than half of the 810 participants from Japan and abroad.
content:
The CEATEC 2025 international exhibition kicked off Tuesday at the Makuhari Messe convention center in Chiba, for a four-day run showcasing cutting-edge digital technologies designed to make people's lives more convenient.

title: Google to invest USD 15 billion in Visakhapatnam AI hub; Largest investment outside US
description: Google on Monday announced a massive investment of USD 15 billion over the next five years to establish one gigawatt-scale Artificial Intelligence (AI) hub in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, the company's largest AI hub outside the United States. The announcement came during 'Bharat AI Shakti', an event hosted by Google in New Delhi.

title: Nobel economist warns of AI dangers
description: A winner of this year's Nobel prize in economics warned Monday that artificial intelligence offers "amazing possibilities" but should be regulated because of its job-destroying potential. And it also obviously has an amazing potential for destroying other jobs or replacing highly skilled labor.
content:

title: France's Publicis says AI drives its growth, raises yearly forecast again
description: (Reuters) -French advertising firm Publicis on Monday raised its full-year organic growth forecast for the second time, highlighting artificial intelligence products as its main growth driver.
content:
